info.title: Kejue Platform API
info.description: Public REST API for managing voice AI agents, phone numbers, tools, and calls

ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key in the format: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY

turnEndpointDelay.description: Silence duration in ms before the agent responds (default: 100)

minTurnDuration.description: Minimum speech duration in ms to count as a valid turn (default: 50)

minInterruptionDuration.description: How long in ms the user must speak to interrupt the agent (default: 100)

frameActivationThreshold.description: VAD probability threshold for speech detection (default: 0.35)

postSpeechCooldown.description: Echo guard timeout in ms after agent stops speaking (default: 400)

speculativeSilenceMs.description: How quickly in ms to start speculative inference on silence (default: 150)

fallbackSilenceMs.description: Fallback timeout in ms if endpointing fails (default: 3000)

postCallWebhookSecret.description: Secret used to sign webhook payloads

firstMessageUninterruptible.description: Whether the agent's first message cannot be interrupted by the user

firstMessageDelay.description: Seconds to wait before the agent sends its first message

languageHint.description: ISO 639-1 language code hint for transcription (e.g., 'ar', 'en')

knowledgeSearchInstructions.description: Custom instructions for when the agent should search its knowledge base

backgroundSoundId.description: ID of the background sound to play during calls

backgroundSoundVolume.description: Volume of the background sound (0.0 to 1.0)

turnEndpointDelay.description: Silence duration in ms before the agent responds (default: 100)

minTurnDuration.description: Minimum speech duration in ms to count as a valid turn (default: 50)

minInterruptionDuration.description: How long in ms the user must speak to interrupt the agent (default: 100)

frameActivationThreshold.description: VAD probability threshold for speech detection (default: 0.35)

postSpeechCooldown.description: Echo guard timeout in ms after agent stops speaking (default: 400)

speculativeSilenceMs.description: How quickly in ms to start speculative inference on silence (default: 150)

fallbackSilenceMs.description: Fallback timeout in ms if endpointing fails (default: 3000)

firstMessageUninterruptible.description: Whether the agent's first message cannot be interrupted by the user

firstMessageDelay.description: Seconds to wait before the agent sends its first message

languageHint.description: ISO 639-1 language code hint for transcription (e.g., 'ar', 'en')

knowledgeSearchInstructions.description: Custom instructions for when the agent should search its knowledge base

backgroundSoundId.description: ID of the background sound to play during calls

backgroundSoundVolume.description: Volume of the background sound (0.0 to 1.0)

knowledgeSearchInstructions.description: Custom instructions for when the agent should search its knowledge base

provider.description: Provider type. 'sip' covers both Jambonz and Somleng backends (determined by server config).

sipMode.description: SIP trunk mode: 'registration' for username/password auth, 'ip_allowlist' for IP-based allowlisting
SIP trunk mode. Use 'registration' for username/password auth, 'ip_allowlist' for IP-based allowlisting. Only applicable when provider is 'sip'.

sipUsername.description: Required if provider is 'sip' and sipMode is 'registration'

sipPassword.description: Required if provider is 'sip' and sipMode is 'registration'

sipProxy.description: SIP registrar host (e.g. 'pbx.example.com'). Required if provider is 'sip' and sipMode is 'registration'. In registration mode, this is the host Somleng registers TO.

sipOutboundProxy.description: Optional SIP outbound proxy. Used when SIP traffic needs to route through a proxy instead of directly to the host. Only used in registration mode.

sipAuthUser.description: Optional SIP authentication username, if different from sipUsername. Only used in registration mode.

sipIp.description: IP address of your PBX/SBC. Required if provider is 'sip' and sipMode is 'ip_allowlist'.

sipPort.description: SIP port number. Used in both 'registration' and 'ip_allowlist' modes.

sipProtocol.description: SIP transport protocol. Used when sipMode is 'ip_allowlist'.

sipProxy.description: SIP registrar host. In registration mode, this is the host Somleng registers TO.

sipOutboundProxy.description: Optional SIP outbound proxy for registration mode.

sipAuthUser.description: Optional SIP auth username if different from sipUsername.

sipIp.description: IP address of your PBX/SBC (ip_allowlist mode).

sipPort.description: SIP port number. Used in both registration and ip_allowlist modes.

cost.description: Cost of the call in USD

transcript.description: Full conversation transcript. Only included in single-call detail responses (GET /calls/{id}), not in list responses.

analysis.description: Post-call analysis including summary and extracted data. Only included in single-call detail responses (GET /calls/{id}), not in list responses.

agentId.description: ID of the agent this document belongs to

fileSize.description: Size of the file in bytes

agentId.description: ID of the agent whose knowledge to search

content.description: Text content of the matching chunk

agentId.description: ID of the agent to associate this document with

fileSize.description: Size of the file in bytes

isSystemPreset.description: Whether this is a system-wide preset sound

fileSize.description: Size of the audio file in bytes

durationSeconds.description: Duration of the audio in seconds

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all agents in your organization

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Create a new voice AI agent

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieve a specific agent by its ID
Retrieve a paginated list of all phone numbers in your organization

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

post.description: Register a new phone number. For Twilio, provide account credentials. For SIP, choose between 'registration' mode (Somleng registers TO your PBX) or 'ip_allowlist' mode (your PBX IP is allowlisted). SIP numbers support outbound proxy and auth user options in registration mode.

get.description: Retrieve a specific phone number by its ID
Retrieve a paginated list of all custom tools in your organization

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

post.description: Create a new HTTP tool that agents can call

get.description: Retrieve a specific tool by its ID
Retrieve a paginated list of all calls in your organization

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

post.description: Initiate an outbound call using a configured phone number and agent. This endpoint queues the call and returns immediately with the call details.

agentId.description: The ID of the agent to use for this call

phoneNumberId.description: The ID of the phone number to call from

to.description: The destination phone number in E.164 format (e.g., +14155551234)

contextVariables.description: Optional variables to use in the agent's system prompt and greeting template

metadata.description: Optional metadata to store with the call record

error.example: Insufficient funds. Please top up your balance.

404.description: Agent or phone number not found

get.description: Retrieve a specific call by its ID, including transcripts, recordings, and extracted data
Retrieve a paginated list of all available voices

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

get.description: Retrieve a specific voice by its ID
Retrieve a paginated list of all available Small Language Models

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

get.description: Retrieve a specific SLM model by its ID
Retrieve a list of all knowledge documents for an agent

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: ID of the agent to list documents for

post.description: Upload a new knowledge document for an agent. Requires knowledgeSearchInstructions to be configured on the agent.

400.description: Missing required fields or knowledge search instructions not configured

get.description: Retrieve a specific knowledge document by ID
Check the processing status of a knowledge document

post.description: Search the knowledge base for relevant information

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available background sounds (system presets and organization-specific)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key
